doc:
Claude Akins https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Claude_Akins 0 Claude Marion Akins (May 25, 1926 – January 27, 1994) was an American character actor with a long career on stage, screen, and television. Powerful in appearance and voice, Akins could be counted on to play the clever (or less than clever) tough guy, on the side of good or bad, in movies and television. He is remembered as Sheriff Lobo on the 1970s television series B. J. and the Bear, and later The Misadventures of Sheriff Lobo, a spin-off series. Claude_Marion_Akins ( May_25_,_1926 – January_27_,_1994 ) was an_American_character_actor with a_long_career on stage , screen , and television . Powerful in appearance_and_voice , Akins could_be_counted on to_play the_clever_(_or_less than clever_)_tough_guy , on the_side of good_or_bad , in movies_and_television . He is_remembered as Sheriff_Lobo on the_1970s_television_series_B._J. and the_Bear ,_and_later The_Misadventures of Sheriff_Lobo , a_spin-off_series .
